title: House In Negombo
details: 4 And 3 Bed Rooms. 2 Bath Rooms. Living. Dining. Pantry. Kitchen. Garage. Parapet Wall. Hot Water. Main Line Water. Built On 11, 13, And 20 Perches. Inspection By Prior Appointments Only. Strictly No Brokers. Please Note That We Are Not Affiliated To Any Broker Or An Agent.
